# AchievingCoach - Complete Documentation

> AchievingCoach is a professional coaching platform (plataforma de coaching ejecutivo) designed for executive coaches, life coaches, and career coaches. It provides 12+ interactive coaching tools aligned with ICF (International Coaching Federation) competencies, client management, session scheduling, AI-powered insights, and automated reporting to demonstrate coaching ROI.

AchievingCoach serves as the complete operating system (sistema operativo) for coaching practices. The platform enables coaches to manage their entire business: client profiles, session scheduling, assessment delivery, progress tracking, and professional reporting for corporate sponsors and HR departments.

## What is AchievingCoach?

AchievingCoach is a SaaS platform that digitizes and streamlines the coaching workflow. Unlike generic CRM systems, it is purpose-built for the coaching profession with:

- **12+ Interactive Coaching Tools**: Digital versions of industry-standard assessments (DISC, Wheel of Life, GROW, etc.)
- **ICF Alignment**: Tools and methodology aligned with International Coaching Federation core competencies
- **9-Phase Coaching Methodology**: Structured framework from initial discovery through completion
- **AI-Powered Insights**: Session analysis and coaching suggestions
- **Multi-Role Support**: Separate dashboards for coaches, clients (coachees), and administrators

## Coaching Tools (Detailed)

### DISC Assessment
Behavioral assessment tool that identifies four primary personality types: Dominance, Influence, Steadiness, and Conscientiousness. Helps coaches understand client communication styles and leadership approaches.

### Wheel of Life
Life balance evaluation tool that measures satisfaction across 8-12 customizable life dimensions (career, relationships, health, finances, etc.). Visual spider chart shows areas needing attention.

### GROW Model Worksheet
Interactive worksheet for the GROW coaching framework:
- **G**oal: What do you want to achieve?
- **R**eality: Where are you now?
- **O**ptions: What could you do?
- **W**ill: What will you do?

### Values Clarification
Exercise to identify and prioritize core personal values. Helps clients make decisions aligned with what matters most to them.

### Stakeholder Mapping
Relationship analysis tool for executives. Maps key stakeholders by influence and interest to develop engagement strategies.

### Career Compass
Career direction planning tool that evaluates skills, interests, and market opportunities to guide professional development.

### Emotional Triggers Journal
Journaling tool to identify emotional patterns and triggers. Builds self-awareness for emotional regulation.

### Feedback-Feedforward
360-degree feedback collection tool that also captures forward-looking development suggestions.

### Habit Loop Analyzer
Tool based on habit science to identify cue-routine-reward patterns and design behavior change interventions.

### Limiting Beliefs Transformation
Cognitive restructuring exercise to identify and reframe self-limiting beliefs.

### Resilience Scale Assessment
Measurement tool for psychological resilience with targeted development recommendations.

### ICF Competency Simulator
AI-powered practice environment where coaches can practice demonstrating ICF core competencies and receive feedback.

## Pricing Plans

### Free Tier
- Basic access to platform
- Limited tool usage
- Good for exploring the platform

### Premium Plan - $29/month
- Individual coaches
- Full access to all 12+ tools
- Unlimited clients
- Session scheduling with calendar integration
- Progress reports
- Email support

### Enterprise Plan - $99/month
- Coaching organizations
- Unlimited coaches
- Custom branding
- Advanced analytics
- API access
- Priority support
- SSO integration

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Is AchievingCoach ICF certified?
AchievingCoach is designed around ICF (International Coaching Federation) competencies. The platform includes an ICF Competency Simulator and tools aligned with ICF-approved coaching methodologies. The platform itself is not "certified" by ICF, but supports coaches in practicing ICF standards.

### What languages does AchievingCoach support?
The platform supports English and Spanish interfaces. Additional languages are planned.

### How secure is client data?
AchievingCoach uses enterprise-grade security including AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit, is compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and HIPAA guidelines, and provides granular permission controls.

### Can I integrate with my calendar?
Yes, AchievingCoach integrates with Google Calendar for session scheduling with automatic reminders.

### Is there a mobile app?
AchievingCoach is a responsive web application that works on mobile browsers. Native mobile apps are planned.

### Can I white-label the platform?
Enterprise plans include custom branding options.

## Use Cases

### Executive Coaching
For coaches working with C-suite executives, directors, and senior leaders. Features include stakeholder mapping, 360 feedback, and executive-ready reporting.

### Life Coaching
For coaches focused on personal development, life transitions, and goal achievement. Includes Wheel of Life, values clarification, and goal tracking.

### Career Coaching
For coaches helping clients with career transitions, professional development, and job search. Features Career Compass and skills assessment tools.

### Corporate/Internal Coaching
For organizations with internal coaching programs. Multi-tenant architecture supports separate workspaces with role-based access.

### Team Coaching
For coaches working with teams on collaboration, communication, and performance. Group tools and team dashboards available.

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Firebase (Firestore, Authentication, Storage)
- **Hosting**: Google Cloud Run
- **AI**: Integration-ready for advanced AI features

- **Website**: https://achievingcoach.com

- **Founded**: 2024
- **Location**: United States
